languages.text: Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: Reduces the chance of triggering psychic phenomena by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or perils of the warp manifest, the wielder gets an additional +1 psy rating until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 deflection if the wielder's Willpower is more than 50.

Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

languages.text: Reduce la probabilidad de provocar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} un −10 %. Si cualquier fenómeno psíquico o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidad de la disformidad{/g} se manifiesta, el portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} hasta el final del combate. Propiedad básica de armadura: +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del usuario es superior a 50.
languages.original_text: Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: Reduce la probabilidad de provocar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} un −10 %. Si cualquier fenómeno psíquico o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidad de la disformidad{/g} se manifiesta, el portador gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} hasta el final del combate. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}: +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del usuario es superior a 50.

languages.text: 使{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}的触发率降低10%。在战斗中，当灵能异象或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}被触发时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}会提高1级，效果持续至战斗结束。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}高于50，获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: 使{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}的触发率降低10%。在战斗中，当灵能异象或{/g}亚空间的威胁{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}被触发时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}会提高1级，效果持续至战斗结束。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}高于50，获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Réduit de −10 % les chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}. Si des phénomènes psychiques ou des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} se manifestent, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} supplémentaire jusqu'à la fin du combat. Propriété d'armure de base : +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 50.
languages.original_text: Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

traits.locale_text: Réduit de −10 % les chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}. Si des phénomènes psychiques ou des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} se manifestent, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} supplémentaire jusqu'à la fin du combat. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 50.

languages.text: Reduziert die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} ausgelöst werden, um −10 %. Sollten sich psionische Phänomene oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} manifestieren, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes zusätzlich +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} des Trägers höher als 50 ist.
languages.original_text: Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. traits.locale_text: Reduziert die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} ausgelöst werden, um −10 %. Sollten sich irgendwelche psionischen Phänomene oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} manifestieren, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes zusätzlich +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} des Trägers höher als 50 ist.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}のトリガーとなる可能性を−10%減少させる。何らかの心霊現象または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}が表れた場合、使用者は戦闘が終わるまで{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}に追加で+1を獲得する。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が50以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}+2。

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}のトリガーとなる可能性を -10%減少させる。何らかの心霊現象または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}が表れた場合、使用者は戦闘が終わるまで{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}に追加で +1を獲得する。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が50以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} +2

languages.text: Сокращает шанс вызвать {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g} на 10%. При появлении пси-морока или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа увеличивается на 1 до конца боя. Базовое свойство: +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} больше 50.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}Ruhsezi fenomeni{/g} tetikleme olasılığını %10 azaltır. Giyen kişi, herhangi bir ruhsezi fenomeni veya {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikesi{/g} ortaya çıkarsa ilave +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} kazanır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği 50'den yüksekse +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}.
